Osa Conservation: Movement data audit Part 1 Database changes

Osa Conservation: Movement data audit Chris Beirne Part 1 Database changes This document summarizes data contained with the movement ecology database as of 2023-05-22. 1.0.1 Database changes (last 7 days) The following table shows total number of observations in each database (left) and the new records from the last 7 days (right). The green numbers show where records have been added. Note the changes are from when the data were collected, not when they were entered in Google Drive. If they were entered a long time after the collection date they may not be shown here.
